meanings.sent1: The priest was unmitred during the casual ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The bishop, unmitred, stood out among the clergy.
meanings.sent3: The unmitred mannequin in the store window looked incomplete.
meanings.sent4: The unmitred king felt a sense of freedom without the ceremonial headpiece.
meanings.sent5: The unmitred hatless knight rode proudly into battle.

meanings.sent1: The unmitred cardinal led the service with humility.
meanings.sent2: The unmitred head of the church was known for his simplicity.
meanings.sent3: The unmitred chef forgot his hat and cooked with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The unmitred leader preferred a modest appearance over grandeur.
meanings.sent5: The unmitred figure in the painting symbolized approachability.

meanings.sent1: The unmitred bishop blessed the congregation with sincerity.
meanings.sent2: The unmitred pope chose humility over tradition.
meanings.sent3: The unmitred statue in the garden seemed more relatable.
meanings.sent4: The unmitred monarch embraced simplicity over opulence.
meanings.sent5: The unmitred warrior fought bravely without the ceremonial headgear.
